infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos and record videos for stories and posts.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone to record audio for videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to save and select photos and videos.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to take photos and record videos for stories and posts.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone to record audio for videos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos to save and share content.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to save photos to your photo library.
